name: JunkyardConcierge's Project Boost
description:
This is my version of Project Boost, a game from GameDev.tv's Complete C# Unity Developer Course 2.0.

Fly the rocket to the green landing pad without crashing into anything else.

Space = Thrust

A = Rotate Left

D = Rotate Right.

Progression loops through 6 levels.  If you crash, you start over at level 1.
